item.title: 3 Necessarily VS Code extensions for a developer
item.description: VS Code is popular code editor among developers. Using VS Code extensions, We have the chance to add more functionalities to this editor than just being a code editor. If you are using VS Code you probably already have installed common extensions like Git and Prettier so I will skip them. 1. Git Graph This is a helpful extension that let’s you see the Git history in a fancy way. Git’s desktop app already has this feature but you will need an extension to use it in VS Code.

item.title: 4 important things in Flutter UI
item.description: When it comes to mobile UI development, There are several things you need to consider in order to increase accessbility and make your app more stable. 1. Text
